TopicTitle: Tail Connector B Isn't Orientated Correctly When Taken from the Parts Menu.

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.0.0.20892
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB

It's a small issue but let's say that was a command pod being upside down every time it was taken from the parts menu...
For a plane it needs to be rotated 90 degrees every time it's taken from the parts menu.

Video Evidence:
https://youtu.be/fBzGamd-juI
